About Me

Krishna Rangaraju

Programmer | Developer

Hello! I'm Krishna Rangaraju. I am passionate full stack web developer with expertise in designing, developing, and implementing interactive websites. Experienced in all stages of the development cycle for dynamic web projects. Well-versed in numerous programming languages including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap4, ReactJS, Java/J2EE, MySQL, JIRA, Maven, Jenkins, RAML, Version Control, PostgresSQL and MongoDbStrong background in project management and customer relations. I am currently seeking an opportunity for building web applications for a well-established software company.

Current Job: Senior Java Developer at BBVA Bank
Experience: 7 plus years of Experience

He learned a highly customized API framework and learned how to interact with his Global counterparts with ease. He has been an asset to the team and a complete joy to work with. He would be an asset to any team.

Luis Alberto | Senior JavaEE Specialist

Krishna and his team always have shown constant interest in learning and incorporating good practices into its day-to-day operations. Understand the functional purpose of an API requirement and is open to adopt and propose solutions that complement the design of functionalities.

He displayed the ability to adapt quickly to change in Program Management's direction in priorities while still maintaining quality in the work. He takes the time to establish open lines of communication within the Java group and has done very well with them in making sure that he is a cross functional asset to others. He is highly recommended.
